explains: adj. 混乱的，无秩序的；骚乱的；无法无天的
wordGroup: disorderly conduct 扰乱社会治安的行为，妨碍治安行为

sentences.en: She was jailed for being drunk and disorderly.
sentences.cn: 她因酗酒和扰乱治安而被监禁。

sentences.en: The marchers were charged with disorderly conduct and later released.
sentences.cn: 游行者们被控扰乱社会治安罪，后被释放。

sentences.en: There were young men and women working away at tables all over the large and disorderly room.
sentences.cn: 那间宽敞而又凌乱的房间里到处都是伏案工作的青年男女。
